additional_notes: Leela wears sensible jeans in this episode, avoiding any fashion victim status.
bottom_line: A masterpiece, designed to do nothing more than scare kids, which it does very efficiently. It's a very good Leela story, too. Her gloating over the dead Rutan is wonderful, as is the final scene where the Doctor expresses his horror at needless death.
